00003 // Do a remote ssh connection with local password
00004 function do_ssh($host, $user, $password, $command)
00005 {
00006         umask(0077);
00007         $tmpfname = tempnam("/tmp", "egTinker");
00008         chmod($tmpfname, 0700);
00009         $fp = fopen($tmpfname, "w");
00010         fputs($fp, "#!/bin/sh\necho $password\n");
00011         fclose($fp);
00012         putenv("DISPLAY=none:0.");
00013         putenv("SSH_ASKPASS=$tmpfname");
00014         system("ssh -x -t -t $host -l$user $command");
00015         unlink($tmpfname);
00016 }

00018 // Do a remote scp connection with local password
00019 function do_scp($origin, $destination, $password)
00020 {
00021         umask(0077);
00022         $tmpfname = tempnam("/tmp", "egTinker");
00023         chmod($tmpfname, 0700);
00024         $fp = fopen($tmpfname, "w");
00025         fputs($fp, "#!/bin/sh\necho $password\n");
00026         fclose($fp);
00027         putenv("DISPLAY=none:0.");
00028         putenv("SSH_ASKPASS=$tmpfname");
00029         system("scp -pqrC $origin $destination &");
00030         unlink($tmpfname);
00031 }
